list.name: Changes
list.comment:
feat: add ChatMessage model and UserProfile relationship
- Add ChatMessage model (user_id, role, content, created_at) - Update UserProfile with messages relationship (back_populates) - Prepare database schema for persistent AI chat history - Define foreign key constraints for user-message linking

task.summary: Default task
Create project structure and requirements
Create project structure and requirements
add workouts route and template with table
add imports route and test file upload
add CSV upload and save file by hash with validation
add storage for upload workouts, show recent uploads in workouts page
add navigation button on index, workouts, imports pages
add success and error message with PRG
Create SQLite setup and db engine with SQLModel
Create models for UploadedFile and Workout
Prep for refactoring: created separate 'services' folder and added 'file_validator' function
created 'save_file_with_hash' function
deleted datatime from 'save_file_with_hash' and refactor @app.post('/imports')
The save_file_with_hash function has been improved: it now checks for duplicates. Route /import is connected to the database. A table has been created in the database
The stub has been removed from the list_workouts function in the @app.get('/workouts') route. function connected to the UploadedFile, modified template list_workouts.html
Add database relationships between UploadedFile and Workout model
Add SQL model UserProfile and update Workout model
Add first parse_cvs service
Upgrade parse_cvs: add moving_mask, calories and moving metrics
Upgrade Workout model
Upgrade Workout model again xD. Preparation for an atomic write operation in the database
Update UserProfile model, add get'/profile' route to display user profile
Create template profile.html
add Get route for profile creation form
Fixed parse_csv_to_workout to correctly associate Workout with UploadedFile: removed file_path from Relationship

Feature: Add workouts list page with pagination
- Created GET /workouts with pagination support (10 workouts per page) - Added a total page count - Implemented sorting by ID (newest on top) - Created a workouts.html template with a workout table - Added navigation between pages (Previous/Next)

fix: handle missing heartrate and cadence in CSV import
- Add get_metric_or_none() helper function - Make heartrate and cadence fields optional - Prevent crashes on incomplete workout data

feat: add workout detail page
- Created GET /workouts/{workout_id} for detailed view of workout - Added workout_detail.html template. - All metrics are shown: power, heart rate, cadence, speed, calories - Missing data handling (heart rate, cadence) - Back to list navigation added

Progress: Created the OllamaService class, added asyncgenerate() for Ollama LLM integration.
- Implemented the asynchronous generate() function for communicating with the local LLM via the Ollama API. - Handling connection and timeout errors.

Feature: Add format_workouts() for AI coach
- Implemented the format_workouts() function for converting workouts to text. - Format: compact strings with key metrics (distance, TSS, power, NP, IF). - Conditional display of heart rate and cadence (if data is available). - The user can select the number of workouts to analyze.

feat: add OllamaService with AI coach integration
- Implement generate() for LLM communication - Add format_workouts() for workout formatting - Add get_training_advice() to get AI recommendations - Handle connection errors and timeouts

feat: implement AI coach UI
- Add GET /coach and POST /coach/advice routes - Add coach.html form and advice.html result page - User can select number of workouts to analyze - Call OllamaService to generate recommendations

feat: add AI coach with Ollama integration
- Implement OllamaService (generate, format_workouts, get_training_advice) - Add GET /coach and POST /coach/advice routes - Create coach.html form and advice.html result page - User selects number of workouts to analyze (1-20) - Fixed stream mode issue (stream=false)

feat: add ChatMessage model and UserProfile relationship
- Add ChatMessage model (user_id, role, content, created_at) - Update UserProfile with messages relationship (back_populates) - Prepare database schema for persistent AI chat history - Define foreign key constraints for user-message linking

- Implemented the asynchronous generate() function for communicating with the local LLM via the Ollama API. - Handling connection and timeout errors.

- Implemented the format_workouts() function for converting workouts to text. - Format: compact strings with key metrics (distance, TSS, power, NP, IF). - Conditional display of heart rate and cadence (if data is available). - The user can select the number of workouts to analyze.
